actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to make uniform the capitation grant requirements for schools of optometry.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to conform Federal grant requirements for nonprofit private schools of optometry to such requirements for other schools of optometry.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to make uniform the capitation grant requirements for schools of optometry.
